column1: Atleast something else is going on we hear less of coronavirus.
Didn't 300 odd people die yesterday from #coronavirus but let me guess you want us to move on? https://twitter.com/MattHancock/status/1266758277041401857
I really don't understand Karol Sikora's enthusiasm about coronavirus. He was last this excited about privatising the NHS.
